response.overview: The man-woman relationship is of great profundity. It has defied the logic of philosophy, the wisdom of spirituality and the inquisitiveness of psychoanalysis with all its subtlety and complexity which are beyond time and space. The mystery of the relationship caught the imagination of great philosophers and writers since the time of Sophocles, Aeschylus, Shakespeare, and Kalidasa and has continued to mesmerize their forerunners living in the present times
response.title: Vimukthi
